page.title: 09Safetywear Factory
page.content: On Sizewell road two miles from the coast W.M.Stephens have a factory.The company which moved here in 1962 has as its trade mark a picture of a dog wearing goggles.This is a reminder of the days when they made goggles for dogs travelling in the first motor cars! Today they make all kinds of safty wear and industrial clothing.Some of this clothing is to keep men warm who work in cold places like the frozen food factoriei at lowestoft. Apart from this they also make donkey jackets,bodywarmers anoraks, fur jackets and duffle coats.Sixty people work there and make two milliion articles each year.Many products are sold abroad to such countries as Nigeria,Sweden,Denmark,Holland,central America etc.The factory is open for 39 hours a week and most of the people who work there,live close by.
